name: Hentai Dream
description:
- 12 enchanting ladies
- Magnificent visual design
- Amazing musical selection
- Over 60 levels



12 enchanting girls that appeared as if from a magical dream.



The game's graphic design is done in a bright and colorful style, and each girl has her own unique design and clothing style. The visual component, together with an attractive soundtrack, creates an atmosphere of magic and fairy-tale, allowing players to enjoy an unforgettable gaming experience.



In this captivating puzzle game, you can expect over 60 exciting levels, making it perfect for puzzle enthusiasts. The levels vary in difficulty. At the end of each level, the player is rewarded.
